[Robert] and his sister, [Brittney] love it when their grandmother visits because she spoils them. She is coming this week to watch them while their parents are out of town. [Joy] went shoe shopping with her sister [Morgan]. [Kerrie] asked her mother [Debra] if she could go outside and play with her friends. [Kenneth] bought a steak dinner for himself and his brother [Harry].
Question: How is [Harry] related to [Morgan]?
